5.218029 - SELECT  COUNT(notes.id) as count from notes where notes.status =0 and notes.user_id_to=14
5.695105 - SELECT orders.id,orders.shop_id,orders.status_id,JSON_UNQUOTE(orders.payment) as payment,JSON_UNQUOTE(orders.order_details) as order_details,orders.gross_price,orders.shipping_cost,orders.created_at,order_status.title as status_title, shop.domain as shop_name  from orders
            LEFT JOIN order_status on order_status.id=orders.status_id
            LEFT JOIN shop on shop.id=orders.shop_id
            where orders.status_id=10   and orders.user_id=14
5.499840 - SELECT * from order_item
            where order_item.order_id IN ('')
5.440950 - SELECT attribute.id, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(attribute.name, '$.nl'))  as name,JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(attribute_group.name, '$.nl')) as attribute_group_name FROM attribute LEFT JOIN attribute_group ON attribute.attribute_group_id = attribute_group.id where attribute_group_id =1 order by name
